meanings.sent1: The new student was pastless, with no stories to share.
meanings.sent2: The blank canvas was a pastless reminder of new beginnings.
meanings.sent3: The pastless book had no worn pages to flip through.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pastless landscape waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The pastless sky held endless possibilities for the future.

meanings.definition: Without a past or previous experiences.
meanings.sent1: The pastless traveler embarked on a journey with fresh eyes.
meanings.sent2: The pastless child approached each day with wonder and curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The pastless computer had no memory of previous tasks.
meanings.sent4: His pastless mind was open to new ideas and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The pastless forest whispered secrets of the unknown.
